channel.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
channel.description:
Grand Idea Mafia is a gamemode originating from MafiaScum
https://forum.mafiascum.net/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=59348
Rules: Every post here must contain a class, it could be an existing one or something new When someone hosts a game, they should randomly generate a post, and therefore a class, for each player GIFoL games would fall under SFoL Special FoL Specific Rules: 1. If a converted class is not given, Neutrals should automatically be considered immune, and Blue Dragon should become a randomly generated class 2. Converted classes can spawn at game start 3. No caps 4. No limit on number of factions 4. King can be any faction of those in the game, even new ones, if you make a Buttered Popcorn faction you can have a Buttered Popcorn King Host Notes: The host has the right to reject any class if they so wish If a class has no specified wincon and is not a preexisting class in FoL or Grand Idea, it is general practice to make is Blue Dragon
So without further ado let's do the thing
I'll start
**1 - Observer**

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
Post 777

Vanilla townie.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
Yeet
Random Thrower
you can yeet any item you can obtain a picture of (an irl picture) at a player, possibly even yourself, causing an effect that item could plausibly cause (at mod’s discretion), either by them having the item or by it being thrown

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Munstrish
item.description:
Post 775
The Spammer (Neutral killing)
Passive:
Spam: Must post at least 20 messages a day (irl) or they get modkilled.
Night ability:
Spam hammer: Spam someone, killing them.
Day ability:
Survival of the Spammest:
Mute someone for the day, making them unable to post without getting modkilled (they are warned of this).
Goal:
Be the last one standing

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Post 774

The Darktamer

Blue Dragon Killer
Shadow Mark (Night) - Mark a player for death. If they are occupied the following night, they will die. - 3 uses
Shadow Field (Night) - Mark all players who visit you for death. If they are occupied the following night, they will die. - 2 uses
Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

The Shadowstriker

Unseen Offensive
Dark Missile (Night) - Make a player believe they were marked for death. Occupy them the following night. - 2 uses
Dark Assurance (Night) - If the assassin’s kill fails, the target will not die and will instead be marked for death. They will die the following night if occupied - 1 use
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
773

Irony Modkill

Passive: Initiate ArMODgeddon
Any player may say: “Initiate Armodgeddon” in the thread. This will modkill all classes with the word modkill in their class card.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
771
Mega Bastard

If this rolls, nobody will win at the end of the game. Nobody will be alerted if this card is rolled, even if another card says it can detect it.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
770

I Saved The Game

If this rolls, Memesky will be modkilled at the beginning of the game. Reroll this slot

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
769

If this rolls, everyone is now a neutral killer. Reroll this slot after the changes

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
768

We’ve updated our privacy policy

Random Social
Before The Update (Passive) - If you are part of a scumfaction, you will know them but they will not know you. You will be immune to any attacks from your scumfaction.
We’ve Updated Our Privacy Policy (Night) - Send every living player the message, “We’ve updated our privacy policy” tonight. - Infinite uses
If Neutral, your wincon is to survive, otherwise. It is your faction’s wincon.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
767

The Mute

Neutral Social

Goal: Defeat the Blue Dragon

Passive: Silent?
You may not post more than 50 posts in a single day or you will be modkilled. Not active on Day 1. (length according to each game)

Ability: Husher (D) (2)
Silence a player for the next 2 hours. If they post before the 2 hours are up, you will dayvig them.

Ability: Anti-Social (D) (oo)
Kill anyone who has at least 6 times the amount of posts than you tonight.

Ability: Moment of Silence (N) (oo)
Choose a player. They will be given the Silent? passive tomorrow for that day.

Note: This is a counter to Litten

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
766
(Whoa that is so unfun )

Robot V 2.0
Passive-Metal-Immune to death and occupation. Not redirection.
Day ability-Take me to your leader-Send someone a message-Unlimited Uses (won’t know who sent it)
Day Ability 2-Laser-Fire a laser killing someone-2 uses
Night Ability 1-Robotic Shield-Shield someone from all attacks tonight. All attacks shall be prevented-Unlimited Uses
Night Ability 2-Robotic Ambush-Kill all players visiting target tonight bypassing immunity-2 uses
Goal:Prevent 1 death and kill 3 people.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
765
I was born in the wrong generation

If new boi or old boi were ever rolled or are rolled after this, discard their affects and reroll this slot

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
764

The Massturbator

Neutral Support
Fixing the Game (Passive) - You are occupy immune, redirect and death immune
Modbias (Day) - You will bypass every form of protection with your night abilities tonight. - 2 uses
No Massclaim (Night) - Kill target player if they have claimed in the thread - Infinite uses
Thot Remover (Night) - Kill all players who claimed the previous day - 2 uses - 1 night cooldown.
Make sure all players who have started/joined in on a massclaim die

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
Post 763

Double

Neutral Offensive

Shadow Sneak (Day) - Learn a player’s class type. (2 uses)

Shadow Hide (Day) - Become immune to death tonight. (2 uses)

Grifting Strike (Night) - Kill a player and make them flip as The Double if they die. You will become whatever class they were. If you fail to use this ability, you will die. (1 use)
Take another player’s identity and win as them.

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
OOC Killer

Neutral Killer
Passive 1: Filler - every instance of X in this class card refers to the number of posts in the GIM thread that do not contain a class card divided by 10 rounded down.
Passive 2: Shield - You will be immune to death, occupy, redirection and bleeding a total of X times

Day Ability: Stay on topic! - Target player cannot vote or use day ability’s for the rest of the day. (X uses)

Night Ability 1: Eliminate - Kill X players of your choice. Bypasses everything. Their wincon will be changed to a survivor wincon. (1 use)
Night Ability 2: Standard Kill - Kill target player (Unlimited)

Read full topic

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
761
Time Wizard
BD support
Reset button (Night) - The game will go back to day 1 and every dead player will revive. 1 use.

Read full topic

New Age
Reroll all classes into classes with a number equal or higher than 500. All future rolls can only have classes within that range. Reroll this slot.

item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:

755
Non-serious player
BD
All of your posts must be off-topic. If you ever talk about the game you will be modkilled.

item.title: Grand Idea Mafia: FoL Edition
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
754
The Modkiller
Neutral Killer
Immune to death and occupation.
Modkill (Day ability) - Kill a player. Make everyone think they were modkilled. You might tell the host a fake “reason” for the modkill. Unlimited uses.

Read full topic
